epic.title: Workforce Management & Human Capital Management (HCM)
epic.summary: Unified human resources platform tailored for shift-based medical environments, handling rostering, credentialing, payroll, and performance management.
epic.businessOverview: Unified human resources platform tailored for shift-based medical environments, handling rostering, credentialing, payroll, and performance management.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- Constraint satisfaction algorithm for scheduling
- Biometric time clock integration (fingerprint, facial recognition)
- Mobile workforce app (React Native)
- Payroll connector middleware
- Credential monitoring service with renewal alerts
- HR data warehouse for analytics
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Day 1:**
- Staff profile creation and role assignment

**Day 2:**
- Shift pattern configuration

**Day 3:**
- Payroll system integration

**Day 7:**
- Full deployment with mobile app access
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Multi-Location Urgent Care, Dallas**

- **Challenge:** Manual scheduling across 8 locations, frequent gaps
- **Outcome:** Zero scheduling conflicts, 25% reduction in overtime costs, improved staff satisfaction

stories.title: Employee profile creation (demographics, credentials, specialties)
stories.description: Enable comprehensive employee profile creation including demographics, credentials, and specialties to maintain complete staff information and support workforce management.

stories.title: Role-based access provisioning
stories.description: Implement role-based access provisioning to automatically assign appropriate system permissions based on employee roles and responsibilities.

stories.title: Onboarding workflow and document collection
stories.description: Provide structured onboarding workflow with automated document collection to streamline new employee onboarding and ensure compliance with required documentation.

stories.title: Offboarding and access revocation
stories.description: Support offboarding workflow with automatic access revocation to ensure security and compliance when employees leave the organization.

stories.title: Organizational hierarchy management
stories.description: Enable organizational hierarchy management to define reporting structures, departments, and organizational relationships for effective workforce organization.

stories.title: Multi-location staff assignment
stories.description: Support multi-location staff assignment allowing employees to be assigned to multiple locations and manage cross-location scheduling and coverage.

stories.title: Medical license tracking (state-by-state)
stories.description: Track medical licenses on a state-by-state basis to ensure providers maintain valid licenses in all states where they practice.

stories.title: DEA registration monitoring
stories.description: Monitor DEA registration status and expiration dates to ensure compliance with controlled substance prescribing regulations.

stories.title: Board certification tracking
stories.description: Track board certifications and their expiration dates to ensure providers maintain current certifications required for practice.

stories.title: Malpractice insurance verification
stories.description: Verify and track malpractice insurance coverage and expiration dates to ensure providers maintain adequate insurance protection.

stories.title: CLIA/OSHA training records
stories.description: Maintain CLIA and OSHA training records to track compliance training completion and ensure staff meet regulatory training requirements.

stories.title: Automated renewal alerts (30/60/90 day warnings)
stories.description: Send automated renewal alerts at 30, 60, and 90 days before credential expiration to ensure timely renewal and prevent lapses.

stories.title: Document vault for credential uploads
stories.description: Provide secure document vault for credential uploads and storage, ensuring all credential documents are centrally managed and accessible.

stories.title: Shift template creation (day/evening/night)
stories.description: Enable creation of shift templates for day, evening, and night shifts to standardize scheduling patterns and streamline roster generation.

stories.title: Multi-week rotation schedules
stories.description: Support multi-week rotation schedules to accommodate complex scheduling patterns and ensure fair distribution of shifts over time.

stories.title: Provider-nurse ratio enforcement
stories.description: Enforce provider-nurse ratios to ensure adequate staffing levels and compliance with regulatory requirements for patient safety.

stories.title: Skill-mix requirements (RN vs LPN vs MA)
stories.description: Enforce skill-mix requirements distinguishing between RN, LPN, and MA roles to ensure appropriate staffing levels for each skill level.

stories.title: Overtime threshold monitoring
stories.description: Monitor overtime thresholds and alert when staff approach or exceed overtime limits to control labor costs and ensure compliance.

stories.title: Shift swap requests and approval workflow
stories.description: Enable shift swap requests with approval workflow to allow staff to exchange shifts while maintaining proper authorization and coverage.

stories.title: On-call schedule management
stories.description: Manage on-call schedules to ensure adequate coverage for after-hours and emergency situations with clear assignment and notification.

stories.title: Coverage gap detection and alerts
stories.description: Automatically detect coverage gaps in schedules and send alerts to ensure all shifts are properly staffed and prevent understaffing situations.

stories.title: Clock in/out via mobile app or kiosk
stories.description: Enable clock in/out functionality through mobile app or kiosk to provide flexible time tracking options for staff across different locations.

stories.title: GPS-based location verification
stories.description: Use GPS-based location verification for mobile clock-ins to ensure staff are at the correct location when clocking in.

stories.title: Meal break and rest period compliance
stories.description: Track meal breaks and rest periods to ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations regarding required break times.

stories.title: Overtime auto-calculation (Federal/State laws)
stories.description: Automatically calculate overtime based on Federal and State labor laws to ensure accurate compensation and compliance with wage regulations.

stories.title: PTO (Paid Time Off) accrual tracking
stories.description: Track PTO accrual based on employment tenure and policy rules to provide accurate leave balances for staff.

stories.title: Leave request and approval workflow
stories.description: Enable leave request submission and approval workflow to streamline PTO requests and ensure proper authorization and coverage planning.

stories.title: Attendance exception flagging (late, absent)
stories.description: Automatically flag attendance exceptions such as late arrivals and absences to support attendance management and identify patterns.

stories.title: Multiple pay structures (hourly, salaried, per-diem)
stories.description: Support multiple pay structures including hourly, salaried, and per-diem to accommodate different employment types and compensation models.

stories.title: Shift differential calculation (night/weekend premiums)
stories.description: Automatically calculate shift differentials for night and weekend shifts to ensure accurate premium pay compensation.

stories.title: Integration with payroll processors (ADP, Paychex, Gusto)
stories.description: Integrate with major payroll processors (ADP, Paychex, Gusto) to seamlessly transfer time and attendance data for payroll processing.

stories.title: Direct deposit setup and management
stories.description: Enable direct deposit setup and management allowing employees to configure and update their bank account information for payroll.

stories.title: Tax withholding configuration (W-4, state)
stories.description: Support tax withholding configuration including W-4 forms and state-specific requirements to ensure accurate tax deductions.

stories.title: Year-end W-2 generation
stories.description: Automatically generate year-end W-2 forms for all employees to comply with tax reporting requirements and provide employee tax documents.

stories.title: Payroll audit trail and reporting
stories.description: Maintain comprehensive payroll audit trail and reporting to track all payroll changes and support compliance and financial auditing.

stories.title: 360-degree feedback collection
stories.description: Enable 360-degree feedback collection from peers, supervisors, and subordinates to provide comprehensive performance evaluation.

stories.title: Productivity metrics (Patients Per Hour, RVU generation)
stories.description: Track productivity metrics including Patients Per Hour and RVU (Relative Value Unit) generation to measure provider efficiency and output.

stories.title: Goal setting and tracking (SMART goals)
stories.description: Support SMART goal setting and tracking to enable structured performance goal management and progress monitoring.

stories.title: Annual review workflow with ratings
stories.description: Provide annual review workflow with rating system to conduct structured performance evaluations and document employee development.

stories.title: Performance improvement plan (PIP) tracking
stories.description: Enable Performance Improvement Plan (PIP) tracking to document and monitor employee improvement plans and development activities.

stories.title: Peer recognition and kudos system
stories.description: Provide peer recognition and kudos system to encourage positive feedback and recognition among staff members.

stories.title: Schedule generation < 5 seconds for 100+ staff
stories.description: Ensure schedule generation completes in less than 5 seconds for 100+ staff members to provide fast, responsive scheduling capabilities.

stories.title: Time clock response time < 1 second
stories.description: Maintain time clock response time under 1 second to provide instant feedback and prevent delays during clock in/out operations.

stories.title: Support 500+ concurrent mobile clock-ins
stories.description: Support 500+ concurrent mobile clock-ins without performance degradation to accommodate peak usage during shift changes.

stories.title: Payroll processing for 1000 employees < 10 minutes
stories.description: Complete payroll processing for 1000 employees in less than 10 minutes to ensure efficient payroll operations for large organizations.

stories.title: FLSA (Fair Labor Standards Act) compliance
stories.description: Ensure FLSA compliance in all time tracking, overtime calculation, and payroll processing to meet federal labor law requirements.

stories.title: State-specific labor law adherence
stories.description: Adhere to state-specific labor laws and regulations to ensure compliance across different jurisdictions where the organization operates.

stories.title: EEOC reporting capability
stories.description: Provide EEOC reporting capability to generate required employment data reports for Equal Employment Opportunity Commission compliance.

stories.title: I-9 and E-Verify integration
stories.description: Integrate with I-9 and E-Verify systems to verify employment eligibility and maintain compliance with immigration and employment verification requirements.

stories.title: OSHA recordkeeping compliance
stories.description: Maintain OSHA recordkeeping compliance to track workplace injuries and illnesses as required by Occupational Safety and Health Administration regulations.

stories.title: Mobile app for staff (iOS/Android)
stories.description: Provide native mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms to enable staff access to scheduling, time tracking, and other workforce features on mobile devices.

stories.title: Shift swap completion in < 3 taps
stories.description: Enable shift swap completion in less than 3 taps to provide quick, intuitive shift exchange functionality for staff.

stories.title: Automated schedule distribution via push notification
stories.description: Automatically distribute schedules via push notifications to ensure staff receive schedule updates immediately and stay informed.

stories.title: Self-service PTO requests
stories.description: Enable self-service PTO requests allowing staff to submit leave requests independently without requiring administrative assistance.

stories.title: ADP/Paychex API integration for payroll
stories.description: Integrate with ADP and Paychex APIs for seamless payroll data exchange and automated payroll processing.

stories.title: Background check provider integration (Checkr, Sterling)
stories.description: Integrate with background check providers (Checkr, Sterling) to streamline employee screening and credential verification processes.

stories.title: Learning Management System (LMS) integration for training
stories.description: Integrate with Learning Management Systems to track training completion, certifications, and compliance training requirements.
